body:
Comment 6: 
What about a compromise. *net.DNSError is identical in interface to *net.OpError so one
of

1. ensure that where relevant all net.Lookup* functions return an error that can be
asserted to an interface that matches *net.OpError. 

2. all net.Lookup* functions return a *net.OpError

as what I think is really needed is a way to say 'oh, was that error fatal, or temporary'
